abstract: The base class that represents a directory sharing device in a VM.
overview:
## Overview

Don’t instantiate `VZDirectorySharingDevice` directly; configure a directory sharing device first by using [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration] through a subclass of [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZDirectorySharingDeviceConfiguration].

When you create a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachine] from the configuration, the directory sharing devices are available through the `VZVirtualMachine.directorySharingDevices` property.

The real type of `VZDirectorySharingDevice` corresponds to the type used by the configuration. For example, a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioFileSystemDeviceConfiguration] leads to a device of type [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioFileSystemDevice].

# VZDirectorySharingDevice

**Class**

The base class that represents a directory sharing device in a VM.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZDirectorySharingDevice
```

## Overview

Don’t instantiate `VZDirectorySharingDevice` directly; configure a directory sharing device first by using [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration] through a subclass of [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZDirectorySharingDeviceConfiguration].

When you create a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachine] from the configuration, the directory sharing devices are available through the `VZVirtualMachine.directorySharingDevices` property.

The real type of `VZDirectorySharingDevice` corresponds to the type used by the configuration. For example, a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioFileSystemDeviceConfiguration] leads to a device of type [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioFileSystemDevice].

## Shared directory devices

- **VZVirtioFileSystemDevice**: An object the defines a VIRTIO file system device.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- VZVirtioFileSystemDevice

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
